reuze.pending

Class AbstractMapAgentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.pending.AgentAppController
      • reuze.pending.AbstractMapAgentController

  • public abstract class AbstractMapAgentController
extends AgentAppController
    Provides a useful base class for agent application controller implementations in the context of route finding agent application development. To get it ready to work, all you need to do is, to provide implementations for the four abstract methods. See demoRouteFindingAgent for an example.
    Author:
    Ruediger Lunde

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears all tracks and prepares simulation if necessary.
      boolean isPrepared()
      Checks whether the current scenario contains an environment which is ready for simulation (no agents or not done).
      void prepare(String changedSelectors)
      Template method, which performs necessary preparations for running the agent.
      void run(MessageLogger logger)
      Calls initAgents(MessageLogger) if necessary and then starts simulation until done.
      void step(MessageLogger logger)
      Calls initAgents(MessageLogger) if necessary and then executes one simulation step.
      void update(SimulationThread simulationThread)
      Updates the status of the frame.

      • prepare

        public void prepare(String changedSelectors)
        Template method, which performs necessary preparations for running the agent. The behavior is strongly influenced by the primitive operations selectScenarioAndDest(int, int), prepareView() and createHeuristic(int).
        Specified by:
        prepare in class AgentAppController
        Parameters:
        changedSelectors - Name of the changed selector or null.

      • isPrepared

        public boolean isPrepared()
        Checks whether the current scenario contains an environment which is ready for simulation (no agents or not done).
        Specified by:

        Calls initAgents(MessageLogger) if necessary and then starts simulation until done.

      • step

        public void step(MessageLogger logger)
        Calls initAgents(MessageLogger) if necessary and then executes one simulation step.

      • update

        Updates the status of the frame.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        simulationThread - The thread which was used to run the simulation.
